title: Headstrong
description: Chatbot application tracks the user's mental health which can be monitored on the Habits platform.

title: Habits
description: A web application that tracks the participant's mental health and engagement (Government-funded research).

title: IDA
description: A mobile app being developed to help improve diagnostic accuracy amongst medical doctors.

title: Tekaha
description: A platform for the Tekaha community to connect and socialize.

title: Taskerr
description: Task tracking platform aiming to solve the problem of procrastination.
